trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Bend
There were no other sightings in Bend on or around July 10th 1966
divs: Sighting DetailsMy cousin and I were 15 yrs old laying in sleeping bags on the Deschutes river in July. We were seeing several satellites from different directions...then one came from the south. Except this one stopped directly overhead, then proceded to fly backwards in the shape of 2 sides of a triangle to get back on course and go back south at 3-4 times faster than its approach.
Summary: Watching for satellites on a very clear nite, watched one come from the south, stop and go 45 degrees backward then 45 down and go south at high speed.
